accepter.description: An optional configuration block that allows for [VPC Peering Connection](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/peering/what-is-vpc-peering.html) options to be set for the VPC that acceptsthe peering connection (a maximum of one).

requester.description: A optional configuration block that allows for [VPC Peering Connection](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/peering/what-is-vpc-peering.html) options to be set for the VPC that requeststhe peering connection (a maximum of one).

vpcPeeringConnectionId.description: The ID of the requester VPC peering connection.
